channel.title: Comments on: Rug
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Kristin
item.dc:creator: Kristin
item.description: My bet would be that she thought the place was too clean for a guy.
item.content:encoded: My bet would be that she thought the place was too clean for a guy.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: She seemed to come from a reality where every Wal-Mart carried the same small selection of rugs which never changed.
item.content:encoded: She seemed to come from a reality where every Wal-Mart carried the same small selection of rugs which never changed.

item.title: By: Jonathan Leistiko
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Leistiko
item.description:
Some people have a remarkable inflexibility in the way they view the world. Also, some people just don't listen very well.
Sounds like she lives in the intersection of both groups.
item.content:encoded:
Some people have a remarkable inflexibility in the way they view the world. Also, some people just don’t listen very well.

Sounds like she lives in the intersection of both groups.

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description:
Ha! We exist. Some of us are single. (If you swap Millenium Falcon out for X-Wing and TIE Fighter, then I count anyway :). Though I don't have one now.)
Sadly, so the maintenance woman would never have known :).
item.content:encoded:
Ha! We exist. Some of us are single. (If you swap Millenium Falcon out for X-Wing and TIE Fighter, then I count anyway :). Though I don’t have one now.)

Sadly, so the maintenance woman would never have known :).
